title: 求一个挖矿提示的插件！
author: papwick
txt_content: 就是玩家挖到 金矿 钻石 的时候会在聊天窗口发出提示的插件 可以防止作弊

replies.author: hwei
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 hwei 于 2011-10-10 14:17 编辑 

用EssentialsProtect 就够了，能少装插件就少装。
这插件估计很多服务器都会装。
config.yml 其中protect.alert 部分是调整操作警告的。配置成这样就行了。

protect:
  # For which block types would you like to be alerted?
  # You can find a list of IDs in plugins/Essentials/items.csv after loading Essentials for the first time.
  alert:
    # 10: lava
    # 11: still lava
    # 46: TNT
    # 56: Diamond Ore
    # 57: Diamond Block
    # 14: Gold Ore
    # 41: Gold Block
    on-placement: 10,11,46
    on-use: 
    on-break: 56,57,14,41
